title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 373.6 - Form of benefit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 373.6 - Form of benefit

State Regulations

The form of the benefit paid to a participant from the plan
shall be the same as otherwise selected by the participant and payable under
the system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
373.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
